revised_title: Catalogue of 500 New Nebulae and Binary Star Systems
tldr: The author, William Herschel, presents a catalogue of 500 new nebulae, nebulous stars, planetary nebulae, and clusters of stars, expanding on the classification and arrangement of celestial objects. He also discusses binary star systems, their formation, and the differences between solar and sidereal systems.
scientific_subdiscipline: Celestial Object Classification & Binary Star Systems
